regen.absent_element: handling of disconnections or errors during real-time chat
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer shall implement error handling mechanisms to manage disconnections or errors that occur during real-time chat between players, ensuring a stable and continuous gaming experience.

regen.absent_element: saving log information to a file
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer shall save log information to a file for future reference.

regen.absent_element: handling of disconnections or errors during real-time chat
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer shall handle disconnections or errors during real-time chat by notifying affected players and attempting to reestablish connections.

label: The MultiMahjongServer will have a graphical user interface with which the administrator can get log information.
absence: getting log information by administrator through a graphical user interface
